vision: AI-powered mobile app that solves NYT Pips puzzles from screenshots with optional hints or full solutions

target_audience.primary: NYT Pips puzzle enthusiasts who want AI-assisted solving
secondary: Casual mobile puzzle gamers seeking quick solutions
Puzzle learners who prefer hints over direct answers
Power users who want to understand puzzle-solving strategies

phases.name: Foundation & Core Accuracy
phases.description: Improve detection accuracy and complete core functionality gaps to deliver reliable puzzle solving

milestones.title: 80% Detection Accuracy
milestones.description: Users can reliably extract puzzles from screenshots with 80%+ accuracy on standard layouts

milestones.title: Complete Puzzle Workflow
milestones.description: Users can complete the full workflow from screenshot to solution with corrections if needed

milestones.title: Quality Foundation
milestones.description: Test suite in place to prevent regressions and ensure reliability

phases.name: User Experience & Learning
phases.description: Enhance the user experience with graduated hints, learning features, and better feedback

milestones.title: Progressive Learning Mode
milestones.description: Users can learn puzzle-solving strategies without spoilers through graduated hints

milestones.title: Engagement Features
milestones.description: Users stay engaged with puzzle history, statistics, and better confidence feedback

phases.name: Advanced Intelligence & Performance
phases.description: Implement ML-based detection for improved accuracy and add performance optimizations

milestones.title: ML-Powered Detection
milestones.description: Puzzle extraction achieves 90%+ accuracy using trained ML models

milestones.title: Offline & Performance
milestones.description: App works offline and delivers sub-5-second solve times consistently

phases.name: Growth & Expansion
phases.description: Expand to new puzzle types, add community features, and explore monetization

milestones.title: Multi-Puzzle Support
milestones.description: App supports multiple NYT puzzle types beyond Pips

milestones.title: Community & Monetization
milestones.description: Social features and premium tiers enable sustainable growth

features.title: Enhanced OCR Constraint Detection
features.description: Improve OCR accuracy for reading constraint numbers and text from puzzle screenshots. Currently OCR struggles with various fonts, sizes, and image qualities.
features.rationale: Constraint detection is critical for puzzle solving. Users currently experience failures when constraints aren't read correctly, requiring manual correction. Improving OCR directly addresses the pain point of 40-60% detection accuracy on complex puzzles.
acceptance_criteria: OCR correctly reads constraint numbers in 90%+ of standard puzzle screenshots
OCR handles different font sizes and styles
OCR works with both high and low resolution images
Preprocessing pipeline optimizes images for text recognition
user_stories: As a puzzle enthusiast, I want the app to correctly read constraint numbers so that I get accurate solutions
As a mobile user, I want OCR to work reliably with my phone's screenshot quality so that I don't have to retake photos

features.title: Complete Domino Pip Detection
features.description: Finish implementing domino pip detection to accurately identify pip values on domino tiles. Currently marked as incomplete in the codebase.
features.rationale: Domino pip values are essential puzzle data. Without accurate detection, the solver cannot produce correct solutions. This is a critical gap that blocks full automated puzzle extraction.
acceptance_criteria: Pip detection correctly identifies 0-6 pip values on each domino half
Detection works with rotated dominoes
Handles different domino visual styles and colors
Confidence score reflects actual detection accuracy
user_stories: As a Pips player, I want the app to correctly detect domino pip values so that the solution accounts for all constraints

features.title: Improved Region Detection for Complex Layouts
features.description: Enhance region detection algorithms to handle complex puzzle layouts with irregular shapes, overlapping colors, and non-standard grid patterns.
features.rationale: Region detection is imperfect on complex layouts, causing frustration for users with challenging puzzles - exactly when they need help most. This addresses the known gap in grid dimension estimation for irregular layouts.
acceptance_criteria: Region contours correctly identified for 85%+ of puzzles
Color segmentation handles gradients and similar colors
Grid dimensions accurately estimated for irregular layouts
Fallback strategies when primary detection fails
user_stories: As a user with a complex puzzle, I want the app to correctly identify all regions so that I can get help on the hardest puzzles
As a mobile user, I want region detection to work even with slight image distortions from camera angles

features.title: Complete User Correction UI Workflow
features.description: Finish the user correction UI workflow to allow users to easily fix any detection errors before solving. Currently incomplete per project discovery.
features.rationale: Even with improved detection, some corrections will always be needed. A smooth correction workflow turns partial detection failures into successful solves, directly addressing user frustration.
acceptance_criteria: Users can edit detected grid dimensions
Users can correct region assignments for any cell
Users can fix constraint values with tap-to-edit
Users can adjust domino pip values visually
Changes are reflected in real-time preview
user_stories: As a user, I want to quickly fix detection errors so that I don't have to start over from scratch
As a puzzle enthusiast, I want to correct constraint numbers without retyping everything

features.title: Accurate Confidence Scoring
features.description: Calibrate confidence scores to accurately reflect detection reliability. Currently scores are conservative (40% when actual accuracy may be higher), confusing users.
features.rationale: Conservative confidence scores undermine user trust. Accurate scores help users know when to trust automated detection vs when to verify manually, improving overall experience.
acceptance_criteria: Confidence scores correlate with actual detection accuracy within 10%
Different confidence thresholds for different detection components
Visual indicators clearly communicate confidence levels to users
High-confidence detections proven reliable in testing
user_stories: As a user, I want confidence scores to accurately reflect detection quality so that I know when to review the extraction
As a power user, I want to trust high-confidence detections without manual verification

features.title: Automated Test Suite
features.description: Implement comprehensive automated tests for CV detection, solver, and mobile app components. Currently marked as TODO throughout the codebase.
features.rationale: Automated tests prevent regressions and enable confident refactoring. Critical for maintaining quality as detection algorithms are improved.
acceptance_criteria: Unit tests cover core detection functions
Integration tests verify end-to-end puzzle solving
Test fixtures include diverse puzzle screenshots
CI pipeline runs tests on every commit
80%+ code coverage on critical paths
user_stories: As a developer, I want automated tests so that I can refactor detection code without breaking functionality
As a maintainer, I want CI checks so that regressions are caught before deployment

features.title: Graduated Hint System
features.description: Implement a multi-level hint system that progressively reveals puzzle-solving insights without fully spoiling the solution. From strategic guidance to specific cell hints.
features.rationale: Many users want help without complete spoilers. This directly addresses the pain point of wanting to learn strategies without ruining the puzzle experience, differentiating from online solution lookups.
acceptance_criteria: Level 1: General strategy hints without revealing specifics
Level 2: Identify which region or constraint to focus on
Level 3: Reveal a specific cell placement as a nudge
Level 4: Show partial solution for stuck areas
Users can progress through hint levels at their own pace
user_stories: As a puzzle learner, I want progressive hints so that I can learn without complete spoilers
As a casual player, I want a nudge to get unstuck without revealing the whole solution
As a power user, I want to understand why a placement is correct, not just what it is

features.title: Strategy Tutorial Mode
features.description: Create an interactive tutorial that teaches Pips puzzle-solving techniques through guided examples and explanations of constraint satisfaction logic.
features.rationale: Users want to learn puzzle-solving techniques and reduce frustration on harder puzzles. A tutorial helps users become better solvers, increasing long-term engagement.
acceptance_criteria: Interactive walkthrough of basic Pips rules
Explanation of region constraint logic
Examples of common solving patterns
Progressive difficulty in tutorial puzzles
Track user progress through tutorials
user_stories: As a new player, I want to learn Pips solving strategies so that I can solve puzzles independently
As an intermediate player, I want to understand advanced techniques to tackle harder puzzles

features.title: Puzzle History & Favorites
features.description: Track solved puzzles locally with the ability to revisit, favorite, and review past solutions and the strategies used.
features.rationale: Users may want to revisit puzzles or track their progress. History creates stickiness and helps users learn from past solves.
acceptance_criteria: Solved puzzles stored locally with timestamps
Thumbnail preview of each puzzle
Option to favorite puzzles for quick access
View the solution and hints used for any past puzzle
Clear history option with confirmation
user_stories: As a regular user, I want to see my solved puzzle history so that I can track my progress
As a learner, I want to revisit past solutions to review the strategies used

features.title: Solution Verification Mode
features.description: Allow users to input their own partial solution and verify correctness without revealing the full answer, confirming if their approach is valid.
features.rationale: Users want to verify their solutions are correct without spoilers. This directly addresses the user goal of solution verification while maintaining puzzle integrity.
acceptance_criteria: Users can input partial or complete solutions
Verification confirms if solution is valid without showing answer
Highlights conflicting cells if solution is invalid
Option to reveal which constraints are violated
user_stories: As a puzzle enthusiast, I want to verify my solution without spoilers so that I can check my work
As a learner, I want to know which constraints I violated so that I can understand my mistakes

features.title: Enhanced Confidence Feedback UI
features.description: Improve visual feedback for detection confidence with clear indicators, explanations of what was detected with low confidence, and suggestions for improvement.
features.rationale: Better confidence communication helps users understand when manual review is needed and why, reducing frustration from unexpected errors.
acceptance_criteria: Color-coded confidence indicators per component
Tooltip explanations for low-confidence areas
Suggestions for how to improve detection
Animated highlights drawing attention to uncertain areas
user_stories: As a user, I want to see exactly what the app is uncertain about so that I can focus my review
As a mobile user, I want clear visual cues about detection quality at a glance

features.title: ML-Based Puzzle Detection
features.description: Implement machine learning models for puzzle component detection, moving beyond rule-based CV to trained neural networks for higher accuracy.
features.rationale: ML-based detection can achieve 90%+ accuracy where rule-based approaches plateau at 60-80%. This is noted as a future improvement in the project discovery.
acceptance_criteria: Trained model for grid/cell detection
Trained model for region segmentation
Trained model for constraint text recognition
90%+ accuracy on test puzzle dataset
Model runs on-device for mobile performance
user_stories: As a user, I want near-perfect puzzle detection so that I rarely need to make corrections
As a power user, I want consistent accuracy regardless of puzzle complexity

features.title: Diamond Cell Inference Completion
features.description: Complete the diamond detection cell inference that is currently marked as TODO. Diamond detection works but cell inference from markers is incomplete.
features.rationale: This is explicit technical debt noted in the codebase. Completing it improves detection accuracy for puzzles using diamond markers.
acceptance_criteria: Diamond markers correctly infer cell positions
Works with various diamond sizes and orientations
Integrates with grid detection pipeline
Test coverage for diamond-based puzzles
user_stories: As a user with diamond-marked puzzles, I want accurate detection so that the full puzzle is captured

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Enable core puzzle solving to work offline by caching ML models and solver logic locally, with sync when connectivity returns.
features.rationale: Users may want to solve puzzles without internet access. Offline capability removes dependency on connectivity and reduces latency.
acceptance_criteria: Detection models bundled with app or downloaded once
Solver runs entirely on-device
Hints generation works offline
Graceful degradation when AI features need connectivity
user_stories: As a mobile user, I want to solve puzzles offline when traveling without connectivity
As a user, I want faster solving without waiting for network requests

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.description: Optimize processing pipeline to achieve consistent sub-5-second solve times from screenshot to solution, reducing current 2-5 second variability.
features.rationale: Speed is a key success metric. Faster solve times improve user experience, especially for mobile users wanting quick answers.
acceptance_criteria: 95th percentile solve time under 5 seconds
Median solve time under 3 seconds
Memory usage stays under 100MB
No UI jank during processing
Progress indicators for longer operations
user_stories: As a user, I want quick solutions so that I don't wait long when stuck
As a mobile user, I want efficient processing that doesn't drain my battery

features.title: Multi-Puzzle Type Support
features.description: Extend the solver architecture to support other NYT puzzle types like Spelling Bee, Connections, or Letter Boxed, leveraging the existing screenshot extraction pipeline.
features.rationale: Expanding to other puzzle types increases addressable market and creates a unified puzzle-solving platform, strengthening the market position.
acceptance_criteria: Architecture supports pluggable puzzle type modules
At least one additional puzzle type implemented
Consistent UX across puzzle types
Puzzle type auto-detection from screenshots
user_stories: As a NYT puzzle fan, I want one app for all my puzzle-solving needs
As a casual gamer, I want help with multiple puzzle types without switching apps

features.title: Share Solutions
features.description: Allow users to share their solved puzzles or interesting strategies with others via social media or messaging, with spoiler protection options.
features.rationale: Social sharing drives organic growth and creates community. Spoiler protection respects users who haven't solved the puzzle yet.
acceptance_criteria: Generate shareable puzzle summary image
Option to hide solution in shared content
Share to common social platforms
Deep links back to app for recipients
user_stories: As a social user, I want to share my puzzle victories with friends
As a puzzle enthusiast, I want to share interesting strategies without spoilers

features.title: Premium Features Tier
features.description: Implement a premium subscription tier with advanced features like unlimited hints, priority processing, ad-free experience, and exclusive tutorials.
features.rationale: Monetization enables sustainable development. Premium tier converts engaged users to revenue while keeping core functionality free.
acceptance_criteria: In-app subscription purchase flow
Clear free vs premium feature differentiation
Premium users get unlimited hints
Premium users get priority solving queue
Ad-free experience for premium users
user_stories: As a power user, I want unlimited hints for a subscription fee
As a frequent user, I want an ad-free experience for a reasonable price

features.title: Puzzle Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Provide users with statistics about their puzzle-solving history including solve times, hint usage, accuracy improvements, and streak tracking.
features.rationale: Analytics create engagement hooks and help users see their improvement over time, increasing retention and satisfaction.
acceptance_criteria: Track solve times per puzzle
Track hint usage patterns
Show improvement trends over time
Daily/weekly solving streaks
Shareable stats summary
user_stories: As a competitive user, I want to track my solving statistics
As a learner, I want to see my improvement over time
